proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Valleyview Interiors is a boutique interior design studio based in Kelowna, BC, specializing in residential renovations and custom home projects. Their small, talented team delivers personalized, high-end design services for homeowners across the Okanagan Valley.
proposal.coverHeadline: Elevate Your Online Presence: A Custom Web & SEO Proposal for Valleyview Interiors
proposal.coverSubheadline: Transforming Your Digital Footprint to Attract and Convert More Kelowna Homeowners
proposal.clientOverview:
Valleyview Interiors has established a strong reputation in Kelowna for its refined design sensibility and attentive client service. Over the past five years, your studio has grown through word-of-mouth and beautiful project outcomes, working with homeowners seeking distinctive, personalized spaces. As your portfolio expands and more ambitious projects come your way, you recognize the need for a digital presence that reflects your elevated brand and attracts your ideal clientele.

Currently, your website is dated and difficult to update, making it challenging to showcase your latest work or capture leads efficiently. You’ve also noticed that while referrals remain steady, you’re missing out on online opportunities—especially among new Kelowna residents searching for interior design expertise. You’re ready to invest in a modern, results-driven web experience that positions Valleyview Interiors as the go-to design studio in the Okanagan.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Your current website no longer represents the high caliber of design work you deliver to your clients. The site is visually outdated, lacks mobile optimization, and does not effectively highlight your portfolio or unique approach. You’ve also experienced frustration with slow updates, limited control over your content, and occasional technical issues, resulting in missed opportunities to engage prospective clients.

Additionally, your visibility in local search results is inconsistent. Competing studios with more active digital strategies are appearing ahead of you in Google searches for key terms like “Kelowna interior designer” and “Okanagan home renovation.” Without targeted local SEO and a strong online portfolio, Valleyview Interiors risks losing out on qualified leads and larger projects. Your Instagram presence is promising, but there is no clear path from your social content to inquiries or consultations.
proposal.opportunitySection:
There is a significant opportunity to reposition Valleyview Interiors as Kelowna’s premier boutique interior design studio through a holistic digital strategy. By combining a custom, visually stunning website with robust local SEO and lead generation tactics, you can attract discerning homeowners, showcase your best work, and convert more inquiries into loyal clients.

Our approach centers on building a website that reflects your unique aesthetic, makes portfolio updates effortless, and is optimized for both search engines and user experience. We’ll ensure your Google presence is strong, leveraging targeted keywords and local listings to put Valleyview Interiors in front of the right audience. Integrating your Instagram and streamlining your lead capture process will further maximize your digital impact—turning online interest into real-world projects.

recommendedServices.name: Custom Web Design & Development
recommendedServices.description: We’ll create a modern, mobile-friendly website tailored to showcase your portfolio and drive inquiries. The design will reflect your brand’s sophistication and make updates simple for your team.
deliverables: Integrated project portfolio with easy content management

recommendedServices.name: Local SEO & Keyword Strategy
recommendedServices.description: We’ll optimize your site and listings to ensure Valleyview Interiors appears in top search results for high-intent local queries. Our strategy is designed to attract homeowners actively seeking design services in Kelowna.
deliverables: On-page SEO for core service pages

recommendedServices.name: Instagram Integration & Lead Generation
recommendedServices.description: We’ll connect your Instagram feed to your website and implement best practices for converting social followers into leads. Clear calls-to-action will guide visitors from inspiration to consultation.

recommendedServices.name: Ongoing Support & Website Care
recommendedServices.description: Enjoy peace of mind with proactive website maintenance, hosting, security, and ongoing support. We ensure your site is always fresh, fast, and secure.

implementationPhases.description: We’ll begin with a collaborative discovery session to clarify your business goals, target audience, and design preferences. This phase includes competitor analysis and keyword research.
Our team will design initial website concepts and work with you to organize and update your portfolio content. We’ll present design mockups for your feedback and approval.
We’ll build the website, integrate SEO best practices, and connect your Instagram feed. Local SEO and lead capture tools will be implemented and tested.
We’ll launch your new website, provide hands-on training for content updates, and monitor performance. Ongoing support and reporting will commence.

pricingTiers.description: Perfect for studios seeking a fresh digital start. Includes a custom website, foundational SEO, and basic lead capture.
Ideal for growing studios ready to boost online visibility and generate more leads. Adds advanced SEO, Instagram integration, and ongoing support.
For studios seeking a truly premium, hands-off solution. Includes all features plus Google Ads management, monthly reporting, and priority support.

caseExamples.title: Kelowna Veterinary Hospital: Modern Website & Local SEO
caseExamples.context: A leading animal hospital needed a more professional web presence and stronger local search visibility.
caseExamples.result: Website traffic increased by 68% and online appointment requests doubled within four months of launch.

caseExamples.title: Okanagan Custom Homes: Lead Generation Overhaul
caseExamples.context: A home builder wanted to attract more high-value clients and showcase recent projects online.
caseExamples.result: Monthly qualified leads grew by 3x and time-to-inquiry from website visitors dropped by 40%.

proposal.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Valleyview Interiors’ Online Presence?
proposal.ctaBody: Let’s create a website and digital strategy that reflects your design excellence and brings in your ideal Kelowna clients. We’re excited to partner with you for long-term growth.

enriched.positioning: Thriveline positions itself as a dedicated, local digital partner providing custom web design, SEO, and ongoing support to help Kelowna businesses thrive online with a personal, hands-on approach.
valuePropositions: Personal, responsive service with direct access to a skilled local team
Custom, results-focused solutions tailored to each business
Clear, jargon-free communication and education for clients
Ongoing support and proactive website care
Transparent ownership and control of all digital assets
differentiators: Locally owned and operated with deep knowledge of the Kelowna market
Woman-owned, small team offering direct, personal service
No cookie-cutter solutions—everything is custom and results-driven
Clients retain full ownership and control of their digital assets
Focus on long-term partnerships, not just one-off projects
